item.title: Geometry of Linear Operators
item.description: Introduction The purpose of this note is to give a rudimentary and perspicuous presentation of some foundational topics in linear algebra. There will be an emphasis on geometric intuition and connecting various ideas that are often presented in isolation. The requisite knowledge required is familiarity with rank-nullity and hyperplanes. Mathematical Preliminaries Let $U,W$ be two subspaces of a vector space $V$. One notion we will need is the vector space joined by combining $U$ and $V$.
